subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Collins, 66, the oldest manager in the major leagues, has made his news conferences must-see TV this postseason, full of humor, wit and stories from his winding career.
snippet: Collins, 66, the oldest manager in the major leagues, has made his news conferences must-see TV this postseason, full of humor, wit and stories from his winding career.
